inclusion.criterion: approximately 1-2 weeks prior to her expected date of follow up
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: conversation and invited to participate in the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: interviewed by clinical research nurse regarding symptoms suggestive of disease recurrence as well as treatment induced toxicity
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: research nurse records impression of whether patient has worrisome symptoms of disease or not and has symptoms of treatment toxicity or not for which she should visit the hospital
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: examining physician takes complete history and performs physical examination and any investigations he/she deems necessary
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: final impression of disease status and toxicity taken as gold standard
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: information regarding acceptability of nurse-led telephonic follow-up to patient and financial impact of physical follow- up collected using structured format
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with Stage III disease treated with palliative intent with once monthly radiotherapy
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Early stage cervical cancer patients who underwent Wertheims hysterectomy and who have completed adjuvant radiochemotherapy due to high-risk factors
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patients who are unable to comprehend the questions or dialogue over telephone by medical staff
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patients who seem unreliable for follow up
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of severe 'exploding' headache and abnormal vasculature with a draining vein from L temporal lobe consistent with AVM. She was treated with curative intent with radical radio(chemo)therapy and completed all treatment.
